data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=mhhyHE7UZagQ7kNvgGAg_LU&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDSz6G9-_N-PpgzINhAdygBTpKckR1hGHsTKx_GD0GgYg&oe=66B2099C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=RTs0MyVaLv0Q7kNvgFzDNsN&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAu5_OmY8iPkuIszO_dgydrqrDn6Z2mPF-B67kGkzdKhg&oe=66B21324)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Nu_4NdhdZ-0Q7kNvgEdaXlI&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBFsdZLJYjHcJi5Tv_vUYcSpluveCTFv83yqcZiw0NOoQ&oe=66B1FA87)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2hJLiYsKVqQQ7kNvgE-SSyV&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBqD2K4xCRGcr3njDO5Nblzr433OIO9NGP0W_J8Kn0Vqg&oe=66B1ED66)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=66fUEIDw0SIQ7kNvgHHZCHA&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA6E6S7G-6rHEhMswfXcdtJta2U4u9F60GgKEWPYnwg9Q&oe=66B219D8)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=SnVZUzeTO4UQ7kNvgESsPF7&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDa1840bjL52ql_PD1Nd7TmCXr_wCbASAUVl9Ywl8CHNg&oe=66B21659)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Ov7xI-9x3k8Q7kNvgEY8Qlr&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAxPc0KP9OWvQoY-eP4FxjM5VqYdMXpHAd0rYazPTS3GA&oe=66B1FC70)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=L1kRzpuFZpAQ7kNvgFon_U1&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAfEUw6NBGk2S_kC3eyrMGvz4DKwZgOnxJOGGm-d8QRuw&oe=66B1E6EA)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=_pldOXB1VoYQ7kNvgF9gvt3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDyUlZsk3Wxkfz89cPzEpopevl-MjFmY3CmiJFWKOe94g&oe=66B1FA97)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=eL89-m6vA0oQ7kNvgHte58R&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCvaR05qFFLJgWiJGjgSfWT_67CwHUbHXnAkLlAXHT5eg&oe=66B2160C)
